attributes.action: Recognise Ukraine's Holodomor (Death by Hunger) on its 75th anniversary, as a Genocide against the Ukrainian nation by the Soviet Regime as defined by the Convention on the Prevention & Punishment of the Crime of Genocide as adopted by the UN General Assembly Dec.1948. Article 2,  & demonstrated as such according to this definition (see "More details").
